alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 6:21PM EDT until August 26 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... East central Lexington County in central South Carolina... Central Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 621 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Columbia Riverwalk, or over West Columbia, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Oak Grove, Red Bank, St. Andrews, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Five Points, Cayce Riverwalk, Guignard Park, Dixiana, and New Zion. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 57 and 65. Interstate 26 between mile markers 107 and 123. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
